mdRecord.dcterms:title: Potomac River: from Alexandria to the Great Falls at the town of Potomac, location of the Chesapeak and Ohio Canal from Alexandria to the Great Falls with the Lateral Canal from Georgetown through the City of Washington and contiguous rail roads and turnpikes / C.B.
